name: Speed Spell - Inferno Reckless Summon
text:
When exactly 1 monster with 1500 or less ATK is Special Summoned to your side of the field while your opponent controls a face-up monster(s): Remove 1 of your Speed Counters; Special Summon all cards with the same name as the Summoned monster from your hand, Deck, and Graveyard in face-up Attack Position. Your opponent chooses 1 monster they control and Special Summons all cards with that same name from their hand, Deck, and Graveyard, if any.

(This card is always treated as an "Earth" card.)
